_**Assistant**_



---

You have an incredible opportunity; to pursue my own greatness ðŸ«€

Ah, classic print CSS issue! Browsers strip out background colours and gradients by default when printing to save ink. Even with "Background graphics" ticked, gradients often don't render properly in print.

Let me fix the print styles:

---



---

```bash
cd /Users/nicholasfeyintolafolarin-coker/trellomcp/trello-mcp && git add projects/03-gas-solutions/Rotimi-\ Festac/Rotimi002.html && git commit -m "fix: force print colours to display properly

- Added color-adjust: exact to force browser to print backgrounds
- Removed gradient effects for print (replaced with solid colours)  
- Explicit colour definitions for all key elements
- Maintained colour scheme integrity in PDF output"
```
